tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1760s or 1770s.
1760s or 1770s. Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave (yellow) patterned by floats of a continuous supplementary weft (yellow) and discontinuous supplementary wefts (multicolor). Gift of Mrs. Edward Luckemeyer. 1912-13-27-a/f.
